name: exchange-platform-v3
description: Multi-tenant exchange platform built with Node.js, React, and MongoDB

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && npm install && echo 'Backend build completed'
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules frontend/dist backend/dist

author: Exchange Platform Team
